results.title: Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I
results.text_hl: This study was outlined to investigate @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ effects on @<m>DISEASE_Reflex_Sympathetic_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012019 @@@CRPS-I@@@ model.
